Reviews.Title: “Why do people write such rubbish?”
Reviews.Author: ChrisABirmingham_UK
Reviews.Content: dont fill trip advisor reviews frankly lot rubbish hotel true probably wasnt 4 star hotel proper 4 star hotels considerably expensive decent sized air conditioning decent sized bathroom powerful shower despite 6th floor ample breakfast safe mini bar reasonable prices â£1 beer bottle water comfortable beds desk free wifi perfectly pleasant polite reception staff spoke english ability food drinks 24 hours colleague found street facing bit noisy mine quiet true view didnt istanbul view hotel perfectly fine hotel fair price convenient

Reviews.Title: “Good hotel at reasonable price”
Reviews.Author: Paolo C
Reviews.Content: location hotel perfect close taxim square compared hotels hotel offered reasonable prices spacious clean breakfast ok variety food negative staff hide boredom resulting unfriendly recommended location

Reviews.Title: “Disappointment”
Reviews.Author: Puumeli
Reviews.Content: palace 4 stars suppose hotel friendly staff service stayed 5 nights reservation 6 months quiet 5th floor window inner shaft building main view bricks disco tunes night staff tired bored questions despite 4star rating hotel restaurant service bar breakfast hotel 4 star accommodation 2 stars palace situated city center central location considering local life main sights istanbul town thanks cleaner smile

Reviews.Title: “Great location and helpful staff”

Reviews.Content: happy stay staying 6 nights offered deal price close main square loads restaurants entertainment choose breakfast lots choices traditional turkish fare basic european cereal yogurt fruit eggs street noisy closed windows blocked 90 street noise totally stay
